mapper.select: SELECT MENU_CD AS code ,MENU_KRN_NM AS name FROM HIST_MENU WHERE MENU_CATE = 'F' AND USE_YN = 'Y' AND DLT_YN = 'N'
SELECT HI_MENU_CD FROM HIST_MENU MENU WHERE MENU_CD = #{MENU_CD} AND MENU_CATE = 'F'
SELECT CTN_SEQ AS CODE ,TO_CHAR(RGST_DTIM, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') AS NAME FROM HIST_CTN_HST WHERE MENU_CD = #{MENU_CD} ORDER BY RGST_DTIM DESC
SELECT CASE COUNT(*) WHEN 0 THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS AVAIL_YN FROM HIST_CTN WHERE MENU_CD = #{MENU_CD}
